body_html: @lukaszkaiser, could you evaluate and decide whether this is something we want to do. It may be a difficult thing to change at this point given that the ubiquity of use of both of these. It may be worth providing a transposed version of softmax to allow people to optimize this case?

body: @lukaszkaiser, could you evaluate and decide whether this is something we want to do. It may be a difficult thing to change at this point given that the ubiquity of use of both of these. It may be worth providing a transposed version of softmax to allow people to optimize this case?
